name: Khoros
description:
Welcome to Khoros! Capital City of the Greek Theater! The world´s greatest performers try their best within its walls. Guide Ere to the glory performing the most acclaimed theater plays. Assemble a legendary cast and rise against the fiercest critics of the classical era! Take the main role against your enemies, beware of the aristocrats who want to see you fall, match your characters special abilities, create an astounding party and use your wisdom to get through hundreds of challenging plays. Take Ere to the Olympus as a hero to perform in front of the Gods themselves.

                                                            

Gameplay


In this Sokoban style puzzle game you play as a cast of actors seeking the main role! To do so they must reach the choir podium moving different kinds of objets blocking their path while avoiding enemy actors who want to reach the podium before you. Try not to pass through forbbiden places, using mechanisms, confronting soldiers, prisoners, minotaurs and more.

Goals


Each level has 2 optional objectives, to collect all laurels on the scene and to beat the puzzle in a time trial challenge! As a reward you´ll get a laurel and an hourglass' badges, these resources are needed to unlock special levels, confront new performers and talk them into joining your party. Once both challenges are completed and you have unlocked every character on the game you will unlock the ultimate challenge, "The Tragedy", alternative versions of the levels increasing their difficulty and complexity.

Widen your Cast


Find other performers to have a theatrical duel with you and convince them to join the "Masked Brotherhood". Unlock 15 different characters with unique abilities. Prepare your cast mixing their skills.

Features


  • Astonishing Cast: Challenge great actors in a theater duel and make them join your party
  • Legendary Play: More than 100 levels to face
  • Mix and Match: Combine each actor's unique ability and change the play to your advantage.
  • Comedy and Tragedy: Get the ultimate challenge on Tragedy mode once all characters have been defeated.
